author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Jiemei Electronic and Technology to pay 2017 dividend on April 24
text:
April 17(Reuters) - Zhejiang Jiemei Electronic and Technology Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 1.6 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) for 2017, to shareholder of record on April 23
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 24 and the dividend will be paid on April 24
